entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
